attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
'They should be strung up' you say when they thinking of those accused of torturing and murdering Baby P.
Our current judicial system doesn’t allow this and we call for a return of the death penalty and justice for Baby P.
On the 3-8-07 Baby P was found dead. The post-mortem examination revealed Baby P had suffered: 
• Eight broken ribs and a broken back
• Numerous bruises, cuts and abrasions, including a deep tear to his left ear lobe, which had been pulled away from his head. 
• Severe lacerations to the top of his head. 
• Blackened finger- and toenails, with several nails missing; the middle finger of his right hand was without a nail and its tip was also missing. 
• One of his front teeth had also been knocked out and was found in his colon. He had swallowed it. 
This is not intended to shock, but to re-enforce the need that we need to bring back the death penalty so that the vile, evil perpetrators of such hideous acts are given a sentence in-keeping with their crimes.
In memory of Baby P

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
